dict.string: if you need me, just say Dracarys. I am one of the three dragons born in the wastelands. I was named after Daenerys's late husband Khal Drogo.
I was named after Daenerys' eldest brother. I am one of the three dragons born in the wastelands. I died at the hands of Euron Greyjoy.
I was named after Daenerys Targaryen's elder brother, Viserys. I am one of the three dragons born in the wastelands. I was enslaved by the night king
A dog that likes to play all day long and never sleeps. Always bothing it's owner Magdy.
The dog which eats a lot thus is fat. If you want me to love you, you have to feed me. Also, Gordo means Fat in spanish!
The dog with all the powers. It is the ruler of the Winkie Country. It is seriously aquaphobic. WATCH OUT!!
I am not a dog, I am a Reindeer. I sometimes feel that i was wronfully born and this is why I am always Grumpy. Please don't try to bother me!
The dog with the warmest heart. Its best friends are Timon and Pumba. It fell inlove with Nala since they were both cubs.
Some people are worth melting for. I was created by Elsa and Anna and so I will always be thankful for them. They'll always be worth melting for!
What a wonderful phrase. It means no worries. For the rest of your days. It's our problem-free philosophy.
I like to play in the mud. Just leave me in the garden all day and I will be happy!
I need a facial. All the wrinkles in my face are not because of my old age only. It's also because I have always been exhausted for so long.
I like to plan heists. In season one and two, I robbed the Royal Mint of Spain. In seaosn three, I robbed the Bank of Spain.
What a wonderful phrase. It means no worries. For the rest of your days. It's our problem-free philosophy.
I want a cookie or a piece of cake or a burger or PIZZA. Any food makes me happy.
I've got superpowers! I have super-strength, super-speed, heat vision, and a legendary "superbark".
